name: Never Ever Runner
description:
Have you ever played "Never Have I Ever?"
Time to try a brand new version: Never Ever Runner!
This is an intense, fun, and unique game about your life experience and your character traits!

- Be ready for unexpected questions!
- Run for only your experiences!
- See your character's evolve according to your answers
- Don't be afraid if we tell you things you don't think about yourself
- Check your and other players answers


Have you ever dated someone for their money or looks?
Have you ever used a fake ID?
Have you ever crushed on a teacher?
Have you ever covered up a cheating friend?
Have you ever gossiped about your BFF?

... and many more questions about your experiences
